org.swerverobotics.library.interfaces

Class II2cDeviceClient.ReadWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • II2cDeviceClient.ReadWindow
  • Enclosing interface:
    II2cDeviceClient

    public static class II2cDeviceClient.ReadWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    RegWindow is a utility class for managing the window of I2C register bytes that are read from our I2C device on every hardware cycle

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int cregMax
      enableI2cReadMode and enableI2cWriteMode both impose a maximum length on the size of data that can be read or written at one time.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReadWindow(int iregFirst, int creg)
      Create a new register window with the indicated starting register and register count

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(II2cDeviceClient.ReadWindow him)
      Does the receiver wholly contain the indicated window?
      boolean contains(int ireg, int creg) 
      boolean equals(II2cDeviceClient.ReadWindow him)
      Do the recevier and the indicated register window cover exactly the same set of registers?
      int getCreg()
      Return the number of registers in the window
      int getIregFirst()
      Return the first register in the window
      int getIregMax()
      Return the first register NOT in the window

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • cregMax

        public static final int cregMax
        enableI2cReadMode and enableI2cWriteMode both impose a maximum length on the size of data that can be read or written at one time. cregMax indicates that maximum size.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
